intro: Ononis mitis, commonly known as slender bladder campion, is a flowering plant native to Europe and parts of Asia. It belongs to the family Caryophyllaceae and is characterized by its low-growing, mat-forming habit. The plant features small, pink or white flowers that bloom in late spring to early summer. Its leaves are narrow and slightly hairy, adapted to thrive in dry, rocky soils. Ononis mitis is often found in open habitats such as grasslands and woodland edges.
